name: typedoc-plugin-markdown
description: A plugin for Typedoc that exposes themes and options for rendering markdown.

scripts.samples: npm run samples:microsoft && npm run samples:typedoc
scripts.samples:microsoft: typedoc --theme markdown --name 'Microsoft TypeScriptSamples' --tsconfig samples/src/microsoft/tsconfig.json --out samples/out/microsoft --json samples/out/microsoft.json
scripts.samples:typedoc: typedoc --theme markdown --readme samples/src/typedocExamples/README.md --name 'Typedoc Examples' --includes samples/src/typedoc/inc/ --media samples/src/typedoc/media/ --tsconfig samples/src/typedoc/tsconfig.json --out samples/out/typedoc  --json samples/out/typedoc.json

author: Thomas Grey
